title: Is it possible to achieve band 7.0 in the written part of IELTS academic test if I only got 5.5, and have just 1 month and 10 days for my preparation? What should I do to improve my writing skills? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can only achieve this with VERY hard work and the support of an IELTS specialist. At 5.5 you are almost certainly being held back by a number of crucial factors, such as habitual grammar errors, reliance upon simple structures only and inadequate lexical range (vocabulary). There may also be faults in your essay structure, including paragraphing. I am an experienced and qualified specialist in supporting people to achieve the IELTS band level they need and can help you. For a free 20 minute chat, contact me at the-ielts-tutor on Skype.
